name: Succumb
description:
Solo game jam made for GMTK 2020

Controls:

wasd or control stick - move

e or y(gamepad) - interact

q or x(gamepad) - inject

space or a(gamepad) - jump

Music from Incompetech (https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/)

Inspired by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3918-inspired
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
